reviews.text: Come to this station often, always clean and tidy, only small , but have big local artists pictures up on wall facing station platform to look at. They are of local places in town.

The platform staff are extremely helpful and friendly, went above and beyond and gave myself a great first experience. They helped passengers on to the trains with their suitcases and helped myself when purchasing my ticket.

I needed to get to Hull about 2 months ago. I needed information and guidance . The man who was behind the desk was extremely helpful, He was so informative I was amazed. He is a true credit to hartlepool train station. Well done he is is a shining example of perfect customer service. On the platform you will see giant pictures, These are areas of real interest. Don't miss out on what Hartlepool has to offer.
very cold in the winter make more warmth and colourfull, Meanwhile very good to be annoest

myself and my family were waiting to get the train from Hartlepool to Thornaby unfortunately we got on the wrong train and ended up travelling to Sunderland a young lady (stewardess) was so helpful and even got us back on the quickest train back and was not charged. so helpful and understanding couldn't thank her enough.
